en: It's OK! It's not like you promised me anything exclusive. We just had a cute moment or two together. That's all.
I get what you see in her. All in all, she's dead-on.
She's smart, and strong, and knows who she is and what she stands for, and doesn't try to hide or apologize for it.
Easy on the eyes, too.
But [wave amp=20 freq=10]maybe[/wave] we should keep that between us. If Meredith knew how I felt about her, I can't even imagine how she'd react.
Anyway, you and Meredith get on well. I can totally see you two together.
And you might find it odd, but...
Well...
I feel like...
I gotta say, it actually doesn't bother me at all?
Hmm... Truth be told, I don't see why your thing with her means that [wave amp=20 freq=10]we[/wave] can't keep having 'cute moments' together.
So long as Meredith's fine with it, of course!
And who knows? Maybe she even...
Well, that's a topic for another time.
After the night we spent together, I was a little nervous about where things would go, but... I'm honestly OK with this.
I must admit, I AM a little jealous. But... the weird part is, I don't know who I'm more jealous [wave amp=20 freq=10]of[/wave]?
You're... you, and [wave amp=20 freq=10]Kayleigh[/wave]...
Is this coming out weird? Am I being weird? I'm being weird, aren't I?
It's just, uh... Okay, let me swerve back a sec. Erase all that.
[wave amp=20 freq=10]You two make a lovely couple.[/wave]
Huh.
Actually...
Y'know what, mate? To hell with it! Why not keep dating? New world, new rules, right!?
And, uh... if you and Kayleigh ever feel up for a bit of extra company when you two are [wave amp=20 freq=10]hanging out[/wave], feel free to invite me? She's... cool.
Ugh, nevermind. Scratch that last part.
Well, unless you two [wave amp=20 freq=10]also[/wave]...
You know what? I'm going to stop talking now.
